attributes.description: Overview of the Istiod Service status
attributes.title: [Metricbeat Istio] Overview

attributes.description: Total time in seconds Pilot takes to push lds, rds, cds and eds.
attributes.title: Pilot xds Push Time [Metricbeat Istio]

filter.query: prometheus.labels.type: "rds" OR prometheus.labels.type: "lds" OR prometheus.labels.type: "cds" OR prometheus.labels.type: "eds"

attributes.description: Pilot build and send errors for lds, rds, cds and eds.
attributes.title: Pilot xds Pushes [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Total number of updates received by pilot.
attributes.title: Pilot Inbound Updates [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Time in seconds, a proxy is in the push queue before being dequeued.
attributes.title: Pilot Proxy Queue Time [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Pods not found in the endpoint table, possibly invalid.
attributes.title: Pilot Pods without IP [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Total virtual  services known to pilot.
attributes.title: Pilot Virtual Services [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: The number of certificates issuances that have succeeded.
attributes.title: Citadel Cert Issuance [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Number of endpoints connected to this pilot using XDS.
attributes.title: Pilot XDS endpoints [Metricbeat Istio]

attributes.description: Total number of XDS requests with an expired nonce.
attributes.title: Pilot XDS expired [Metricbeat Istio]
